word:
Chap. 32 - Adam and Eve--Rulers in Eden

     So God created man in his own image, in the image of God created he him; male and female created he them. And God blessed them and God said unto them, Be fruitful, and multiply, and replenish the earth, and subdue it: and have dominion over . . . every living thing that moveth upon the earth. Genesis 1:27, 28.
